collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (19 total Queries, 19 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>General</b></p> <ol> <li>) Obtain a schedule of other operating income and gains. <b>(P)</b></li> <li>) Ensure that other operating income and gains are analysed into the following categories: <ul> <li>Interest;</li> <li>Royalties;</li> <li>Dividends split between: <ul> <li>Income from shares in group undertakings</li> <li>Income from participating interests</li> <li>Income from other fixed asset investments.</li> </ul> </li> <li>Commissions;</li> <li>Grants received;</li> <li>Any of types of significant revenue streams appropriately described. <b>(P)</b></li> </ul> </li> </ol>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure that a schedule is prepared which separately shows income and gains recognised in profit or loss which relate to financial instruments, split between:</p> <ul> <li>Financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss;</li> <li>Financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss;</li> <li>Financial assets measured on an amortised cost basis; and </li> <li>Financial liabilities measured on an amortised cost basis. <b>(P)</b></li> </ul>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Agree totals shown on the other income and gains lead schedule to the trial balance. <b>(A)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Agree comparative to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <b>(P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure that all items are correctly recognised in profit or loss rather than other comprehensive income. <b>(P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment</p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate. <b>(D)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Consider the results of the scrutiny tests completed in the F section. <b>(CL, A)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Walkthrough</b></p>\r\n<p>Undertake one walkthrough test for each system in operation (this must cover the transaction and associated controls). Use the results, along with results obtained in other sections of the audit file, to decide whether to replace some or all tests of detail with detailed analytical procedures. <strong>(A)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Detailed analytical procedures</b></p>\r\n<p>Perform detailed analytical procedures as applicable to the client. E.g. proof in total, ratio analysis (comparing periods and similar entities). <b>(C, CL, A)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Tests of detail</b></p>\r\n<p>Verify any items of other income above performance materiality (either individually or in aggregate) shown in the nominal ledger to supporting documentation.<b> (C, A)</b></p>\r\n<i>Ensure this work does not duplicate work already undertaken on other sections of the audit file particularly debtors and creditors.</i>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>For all known sources of other operating income undertake tests to confirm the completeness of each source of income above performance materiality (either individually or in aggregate). <b> (C)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure non-monetary government grants are recognised at either fair value or a nominal amount. <b> (A)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Review the operations of the entity and consider whether all sources of other operating income have been identified and correctly accounted for, including:-</p> <ul> <li>Sales of scrap production material and production by-products;</li> <li>Sales to staff;</li> <li>Contributions by staff towards subsistence costs;</li> <li>Income from vending machines;</li> <li>Sales of obsolete items of property, plant and equipment and inventories. <b>(C)</b></li> </ul> <i>Ensure that, where relevant, sales tax and duty has been correctly accounted for on these items</i>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Review financial assets to ensure that all which are recoverable after more than 12 months from the reporting date and do not carry a commercial rate of interest have been accounted for on an amortised cost basis and that the unwinding of the discount has been appropriately accounted for as income in profit or loss.</p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>', '', '', '', '2.15 Q2', '2.15 Q2', '34', 'Active', '2024-04-10 14:23:58')

params.name: $head =
params.value: Other Income and Gains Audit Programme

session.name: Davies John
session.allowed:
stdClass Object
(
    [add] => Yes
    [edit] => Yes
    [acin] => Yes
    [clm] => Yes
    [cl] => Yes
    [sd] => Yes
    [audm] => Yes
    [aud] => Yes
    [frm] => Yes
    [sett] => Yes
    [dash] => Yes
)

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p><b>General</b></p>
<ol>
    <li>) Obtain a schedule of other operating income and gains. <b>(P)</b></li>
    <li>) Ensure that other operating income and gains are analysed into the following categories: 
        <ul>
            <li>Interest;</li>
            <li>Royalties;</li>
            <li>Dividends split between:
                <ul>
                    <li>Income from shares in group undertakings</li>
                    <li>Income from participating interests</li>
                    <li>Income from other fixed asset investments.</li>
                </ul>
            </li>
            <li>Commissions;</li>
            <li>Grants received;</li>
            <li>Any of types of significant revenue streams appropriately described. <b>(P)</b></li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ol>
    [1] => <p>Ensure that a schedule is prepared which separately shows income and gains recognised in profit or loss which relate to financial instruments, split between:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Financial assets measured on an amortised cost basis; and </li>
    <li>Financial liabilities measured on an amortised cost basis.  <b>(P)</b></li>
</ul>
    [2] => <p>Agree totals shown on the other income and gains lead schedule to the trial balance. <b>(A)</b></p>
    [3] => <p>Agree comparative to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <b>(P)</b></p>
    [4] => <p>Ensure that all items are correctly recognised in profit or loss rather than other comprehensive income. <b>(P)</b></p>
    [5] => <p>Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment</p>
    [6] => <p>Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>
    [7] => <p>Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate. <b>(D)</b></p>
    [8] => <p>Consider the results of the scrutiny tests completed in the F section. <b>(CL, A)</b></p>
    [9] => <p><b>Walkthrough</b></p>
<p>Undertake one walkthrough test for each system in operation (this must cover the transaction and associated controls).  Use the results, along with results obtained in other sections of the audit file, to decide whether to replace some or all tests of detail with detailed analytical procedures. <strong>(A)</strong></p>
    [10] => <p><b>Detailed analytical procedures</b></p>
<p>Perform detailed analytical procedures as applicable to the client.  E.g. proof in total, ratio analysis (comparing periods and similar entities). <b>(C, CL, A)</b></p>
    [11] => <p><b>Tests of detail</b></p>
<p>Verify any items of other income above performance materiality (either individually or in aggregate) shown in the nominal ledger to supporting documentation.<b> (C, A)</b></p>
<i>Ensure this work does not duplicate work already undertaken on other sections of the audit file particularly debtors and creditors.</i>
    [12] => <p>For all known sources of other operating income undertake tests to confirm the completeness of each source of income above performance materiality (either individually or in aggregate). <b> (C)</b></p>
    [13] => <p>Ensure non-monetary government grants are recognised at either fair value or a nominal amount. <b> (A)</b></p>
    [14] => <p>Review the operations of the entity and consider whether all sources of other operating income have been identified and correctly accounted for, including:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>Sales of scrap production material and production by-products;</li>
    <li>Sales to staff;</li>
    <li>Contributions by staff towards subsistence costs;</li>
    <li>Income from vending machines;</li>
    <li>Sales of obsolete items of property, plant and equipment and inventories. <b>(C)</b></li>
</ul>
<i>Ensure that, where relevant, sales tax and duty has been correctly accounted for on these items</i>
    [15] => <p>Review financial assets to ensure that all which are recoverable after more than 12 months from the reporting date and do not carry a commercial rate of interest have been accounted for on an amortised cost basis and that the unwinding of the discount has been appropriately accounted for as income in profit or loss.</p>
    [16] => <p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>
)
